message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its potential worth, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,150,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please don't hesitate to share your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,050,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your budget constraints, but the value of this product is truly significant.  I could come down to $1,120,000.  I believe this price point represents a fair deal considering the potential benefits you'll gain.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the flexibility, I still need to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,080,000. I hope this proposal allows us to reach an agreement.
